articles.title: From mangoes to luxury watches, Indians look to offload 2000-rupee notes - Reuters India
articles.description: Indians are stepping up purchases of daily essentials, and even premium branded goods, using the soon-to-be-withdrawn 2,000-rupee ($24.46) notes as they aim to sidestep the need to exchange or deposit them at banks.
